data.name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Fish Market
data.detailed_description:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Balearica and Cyprvs - and the Fish Market variant that add variety and new challenges to the game:

  • üêü Fish Market is an alternative variant of the game that changes the mechanics of Bonus Goods, replaces Prefectus Magnus with Prefectus Piscatus, adds Fish as trading Good, and a whole new Fish Market phase!
  • üó∫Ô∏è Balearica is a 22 City map with 9 Provinces and no Capital City. Colonists initially start at sea and later are recruited in player-controlled Cities. In addition, this map changes the Sea movement mechanics.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Cyprvs is a large 30 City map with 12 Provinces. While it doesn‚Äôt introduce any additional mechanics the number of Cities and Provinces poses a whole new challenge in itself!

Fish out new challenges in your Concordia games today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707531/Concordia_Digital_Edition__Fish_Market/
data.about_the_game:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Balearica and Cyprvs - and the Fish Market variant that add variety and new challenges to the game:

  • üêü Fish Market is an alternative variant of the game that changes the mechanics of Bonus Goods, replaces Prefectus Magnus with Prefectus Piscatus, adds Fish as trading Good, and a whole new Fish Market phase!
  • üó∫Ô∏è Balearica is a 22 City map with 9 Provinces and no Capital City. Colonists initially start at sea and later are recruited in player-controlled Cities. In addition, this map changes the Sea movement mechanics.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Cyprvs is a large 30 City map with 12 Provinces. While it doesn‚Äôt introduce any additional mechanics the number of Cities and Provinces poses a whole new challenge in itself!

Fish out new challenges in your Concordia games today!

data.short_description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Balearica and Cyprvs - and Fish Market game variant - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Italian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
